dmca.title: [EV1-C1528708Z] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 9:46 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1528708Z] Copyright Infringement
Subject: [EV1-C1528708Z] Copyright Infringement


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Infringement
Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 25 2006 01:31 pm

  Tue, 24 Oct 2006 23:17:09 -0500

Delivery-date: Tue, 24 Oct 2006 23:17:09 -0500

helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from

 (Exim)
 id 1GcaCS-0001TK-TM

        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
kate@katesplayground.com) 
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
        (Exim) 
        id 1GcaCP-000OXm-2G 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 24 Oct 2006 23:17:05 -0500
Received: (qmail 16584 invoked by uid 48); 25 Oct 2006 00:16:58 -0400
Received: from 70.71.231.128 
        (SquirrelMail authenticated user kate@katesplayground.com) 
        by mail.spunkycash.com with HTTP; 
        Wed, 25 Oct 2006 00:16:58 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <2684.70.71.231.128.1161749818.squirrel@mail.spunkycash.com>
Date: Wed, 25 Oct 2006 00:16:58 -0400 (EDT)
Subject: Copyright Infringement
From: kate@katesplayground.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal@spunkypro.com
User-Agent: SquirrelMail/1.4.6-7.el4
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
X-Priority: 3 (Normal)
Importance: Normal
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 207.226.165.50 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of katesplayground.com)
client-ip=207.226.165.50; envelope-from=kate@katesplayground.com;
helo=spunky03.rackco.com;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Oct 2006 04:17:09.0538 (UTC)
FILETIME=[7051A820:01C6F7EC] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hello,
The site www.simplyrandom.com appears to be hosted by your company.
Having no other way of contacting the people who run simplyrandom.com I
am forced to send this notice to you, theplanet.com, in hopes that you
have the ability to remove the material in question. If you are unable
to do so can you please provide me with an email address or some form of
contact with the people who run simplyrandom.com so that I may send this
DCMA notice to them. 
Thank You,
Kate Ground 
 
Dear Sirs/Mesdames: 
 
RE:    Infringement and request for removal pursuant to 17 USC 512 
 
YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED of infringement pursuant to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act 17 USC 512.  Pursuant thereto you are hereby
given notice that the undersigned has authority to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right, that is, copyrights of Spunky Productions
Inc.  operating under its trade name KatesPlayground.com.  The
information set forth herein is believed to be accurate pursuant to a
good faith belief that the use of the material in the matter complained
of is not authorized by my client, its agent or under the applicable
law. The infringement material is identified as being located on the
World Wide Web at:

Pursuant to the DCMA you are required to expeditiously remove, or
disable access to, the infringing material, and notify the subscriber of
such removal or disablement.  Pursuant to 17 USC 512(g)(1) an internet
service provider (ISP) that has registered with the copyright office the
name and contact information of the person to receive infringement
notices, enjoys immunity from liability for the removal or disablement
of infringing content, so long as additional safe guards as provided by
statute. 
 
Please forward this notice to your corporate legal department, general
counsel, or other legal counsel immediately for action and direct all
responses to the attention of the writer at the contact information
provided below. I thank you for your immediate attention to this notice
and request for removal of the infringing material forthwith. 
 
Yours truly, 
 
Kate Ground
Spunky Productions Inc. 
kate@katesplayground.com
